file_content.text: Thanks for rescuing me. Thought I was a dead man.
Blast, I can barely see straight. They pumped me full of... something. Makes my face numb.
Tell me what happened to the other officers.
There should be more of you.
I'm the only one left. Don't know what happened to the rest.
Who's "they"?
Never heard any names. Most of these people don't even speak Basic.
Isn't that what you came for?
We never asked for this. We just wanted to have some fun.
These cute little dancers brought me and my shipmates here to blow off steam.
Next thing we knew, the dancers were gone. Guards beat us half to death. Threw us in these cages like animals!
Did they ever say what they wanted with you?
There must have been a reason.
I'm not sure, but I think these people work for someone else.
Calm down--it's over.
I'm rescued, but what about the others?
It was clearly a trap, stupid.
Look, I'm from Dantooine. They don't have places like this back home.
They smuggled us out one by one in waste containers. Nobody came back except for a gunnery ensign.
He was... different. Didn't even recognize me. Wherever they took him, something terrible happened.
Time to go, Lieutenant. You ready to run for it?
Let's get out of here.
I can make it out on my own. You need to find the others.
I'm going to find out what.
I think I might know where to start.
You're just babbling.
No, you have to believe me! There was something seriously wrong with that ensign.
I heard the guards mention the quarantine zone. I think that's where they took the others. Please, you have to save them.
I'll turn the quarantine zone upside down, if that's what it takes.
You can count on it.
Be careful. The quarantine zone is toxic. If bad guys can survive there, they must be pretty tough.
I haven't come this far to stop now.
You can count on it.
You've made a friend for life, Master Jedi.
Havoc Squad doesn't quit until the job's done.
You don't have to ask twice.
They're not kidding when they call you guys heroes.
You're making my life really complicated, pal--but I'll go.
I hate this, but I'll do it.
Thanks. Watch yourself in the quarantine zone. They don't call it that for nothing.
Quarantine zone? What's that?
The quarantine zone's an old industrial district, a toxic dump. Great place for bad guys to hide.
Shut up and run.
Thanks for busting me out. I owe you one.
Thank you. I'm Lieutenant Rale of the cruiser Coruscani Flame.
Not sure how you people found me--just glad you did.
Never been so happy to see a Jedi my whole life.
Getting rescued by Havoc Squad is kind of an honor.
I don't know who you are, but you just became my favorite person in the galaxy.
You busting in here is the highlight of my life.
